snippet: Amid reports that the Egyptian police, firing tear gas, birdshot and live ammunition, killed at least four demonstrators on Friday, bloggers filed a series of vivid reports.
abstract: Amid reports that the Egyptian police, firing tear gas, birdshot and live ammunition, killed at least four demonstrators on Friday, bloggers filed a series of vivid reports.
lead_paragraph: Updated | Saturday | 9:12 a.m. As my colleague David Kirkpatrick reports from Cairo, protesters battled police officers in several Egyptian cities on Friday, two days after more than 70 soccer fans were killed following a security lapse at a stadium in Port Said.

headline.main: Activists Document Street Battles in Cairo

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
